data.title: Status updates – Page 94 – Fu
data.text:
by IreneBelserion69, Jul 1, 2019, 4:07:58 AM

Journals / Personal

As expected I’m going to be revising many calcs for Fairy Tail and other anime with Adjacent calcs to this and what better than to redo the mother of all Fairy Tail feats, the Legendary Deus Sama Comet feat.

The original feat had various conflicting scaling issues due to the problem of estimating the true size of Deus Sama, thankfully the anime fixes this issue and we get a true size of this realsitivtic Asteroid of death.

As you see i was more than right on the original timeframe being less than 10 seconds, i measured ti between 3 to 5 second and going by this gif i wasn’t disappointed.

Earthland:91px(12750km)

Deus Sema:747px(1,704.2265 m)

Difference between Earth-Size and Meteor Size:7481.399919552947 times

95,387,848.97430007

1909px/91px=20.97802197802198

95387848.97430007/20.97802197802198

747/91=8.2

4,546,996.654400209/8.2

554,511.7871219767

Final distance of Deus Sema: 554,511,787 meters

This is roughly the distance of the Earth and Moon. Irene’s activation of the spell seemed to take only between 0:5 and 0:11 to activate the Asteroid, the Asteroid was visible as a small Red Dwarf like a light in the background, meaning that even from a vast distance, it was radiating intense enegery.

Now comes the crazy part, speed of the Asteroid.

Going by timeframe, the meteor was shown at its distance at 0:13, began acclreararting at 0:14 and reach earth in 0:17 and exploded at 0:19, this is actually more or less the timeframe i predicted within my journal.

554,511.7871219767/3 seconds

The final speed of the Asteroid:184,837,262.3739922 m/s(61.65%c)

In other words just merely 1.02 times faster than i previously calced, in fact, my prediction was right on the fucking money, only slightly off by distance.

This would make the meteor between 3-5 seconds in the timeframe as i rightfully predicted in the past. We’ll go with 3 seconds as it seemed to have rapidly moved to space and the frame between 15 and 16 seems to be a close up on the asteroid.

Given our previous calculations used the Sema comparison and cloud dispersion, we’re still using the original

The Atmospheric Impact enegery is far scarier too, the collision of the Asteroid with the Atmosphere alone creates an intense flame that covers a considerable chunk of the planet itself

People already beat me to calculate the explosion of this feat but i decide to use our real world scaling for this mega feat. This calc image is based on this calc below from Vs Battle Wik but to get the actual size of the area, let’s get the size of the two continents.

Size of Isghal : 140 px( 2550km)

Estimated Diameter of Atmospheric Fire:3023.571428571429 km

Estimated Area of the Fireball:9,141,984.183673469 sg km

To give you a frightening context of the fireball, this fireball is large enough to engulf the entire Continental United States .

Now we got that, we can use the Nuke Map to see the actual destructive force needed to generate a fireball of this size that spans roughly the size for the Continental United States excluding Alaska and Hawaii and given the meteor approached Erza at 61.6% the speed of Light, meaning within 1/54,347 th of a second , merely the fireball hitting the atmosphere, it would be enough to incinerate all of America instantly. Now for the math.

Going by the result to create a fireball roughly large enough to engulf the distance between Alvarez and Isghal, you would need at least 3150000000000 Kilotons of TNT or 3 150 000 000 megatons or TNT which translates to 3.15 Petatons of TNT.

This is roughly 31.5 times the destructive power of the Chicxulub Asteroid that killed the dinosaurs.

We would literally not be able to survive even a second if this hit us in the real world as, within a split second, a shockwave powerful enough to travel the entire world would blow down every building all across the entire Nothern Hemisphere. killing every living person and creature on the planet in a split second with only Southern Africa, Aursritila, Southeastern Aisa, Japan, and Southern South America surviving the first initial shockwave, they would live long enough to see the entire world on fire as temperatures dramatically rise to over 1,000 degrees instantly and would die from the global firestorm in several seconds, only those below ground and in reinforced buildings at the deep interior would have any chance of survival and that’s only for merely a few seconds as this was merely the initial contact with the Atmosphere, the worst has yet to come.

This is what windspeeds of over 900 mph looks like on our planet, nothing on planet earth would survive being hit by these winds. Now Imagine windspeeds traveling at 463,100 times that speed crossing the earth at speeds approaching lightspeed? There would be nothing left on the planet, you would be dead before you could even hear the shockwave.

The pressure of the explosive shockwave would equal roughly 1.1664929339e+26 pounds per square inch or 5.3e+25 kg per square inch, that’s roughly the pressure eqauilvent of 9 Earth Masses per Square Inch or the force eqauilvent of 9 Earths hitting you at 9.81 m/s per Square inch, meaning your body would be instantaneously obliterated into dust on a subatomic level and this is merely the sheer pressure wave.

Deus Sema’s Atmospheric Shockwave: 3.15 Petatons of TNT.

Now for the sheer volume of heat generated merely passing the Earth’s Atmosphere in under a second.

Exploison diameter: 278px(3023.57km)

Fireball Diameter:336px(3656.8 km)

Fireball depth:9px(97.95 km)

Volume of Fireball:1.277569121808e+18 m

Denisty of Air:1.225 kg/m^3

Mass of the Atomsphere:1.5650221742148e+18 kg

Vaporization of Oxygen:213,125 J/kg

Temperature of Atmospheric Entry:3,825 °C

Average Atmospheric temperatures: -15 C

The size of the fireball is roughly eqauilvent to 1/4th the mass of the Earths Atmosphere or nearly 8 times the mass of Saturn’s Moon Prometheus so Deus Sema impacting our Atmosphere alone created a fireball large enough to equal a mega Asteroid the size of the Island of Sumatra.

Now to factor all these in.

1.277569121808e+18×1.225 kg/m^3

1.5650221742148e+18 kgx213,125 J/kg

3,825 °C – -15 C=3840°C

1.5650221742148e+18 kgx213,125 J/kgx3840°C

1.280814147377392e+27 Joules

1.280814147377392e+27 joule = 306 121 928 150 megaton [explosive] or 306.121 Petatons of TNT.

This attacks power is devastating, to put into context, that’s enough heating enegery to completely engulf the entire planet in a firestorm. Given the fire gases are injected thousands of kilometers onto the planet instantaneously, it would take merely seconds before the vaporized gasses fall down and rain flames onto the entire planet.

Before the Asteroid even impacts the surface of the Earth, the planet would be engulfed in a planetary firestorm.

In other words, this would be pretty much the effect on every living person on planet earth, those not completely destroyed by the shockwave would be vaporized instantly by the intense inferno flames. Unless they’re immune to fire like Natsu, the chances of survival would be next to zero unless you’re within underground shelter however it might not do much good as with the atmosphere on fire, all oxygen is converted to slams and those in the flames are completely engulfed in fire and this is before the meteor even impacts.

The movie Knowing would probably be the best example of this destructive event as everything is engulfed by the sun, though many wouldn’t have time to save their final words as they would’ve melted already.

Now for the potential enegery of the Fireball falling back to the earth, falling back to Earth at 20km/sec, the flames would fall back to earth in 5 seconds with the energy of 3.1300443484296e+26 Joules or 74.809 Petatons of TNT, The flames would burn at such intensity that it would equal 7.475 Quadrillion tons of oil per second or 974 945 637 458 764 544.00 US gallons per second, that’s over 23.212 Quadrillion Barrels of Oil burning per second.

That’s nearly 45 times the volume of great Scaprin Sea, the Largest Lake in the whole world with an astounding 1,059,723,518,976.917 Cubic Kilometers. That’s over 13751.2 times the World’s Oil reverses currently. That’s enough oil to cover the North American continent in 292.5 meters of intense oil like flames or nearly the height of the empire state building.

The thermal energy of Deus Sema impacting the Atmosphere: 306.121 Petatons of TNT.

Now for the Dispersion of clouds, as covered already, the explosion dispersed clouds, not much to talk about here as the explosion already hit with a devastating force and speed. Given the clouds were parted isntantesouly to the point they created plasma in the upper atmosphere, this further reaffirms the previous measurement that the cloud pariting and the side effects would produce.

First, let’s part some clouds.

Earthland:955px(12,750,000 m)

Cloud parting impact:50px(667,539.26m)^2

Cloud Depth: At least 8,000 m

Volume:3,564,869,384,062,937 m^3

The density of the cloud: 3 grams per m^3

Mass:10,694,608,152,188.81 kg

Velocity184,837,262.3739922 m/s(61.65%c)

3.653792936372352e+29 joule = 87 327 747 045 000 megaton [explosive]

Merely approaching the planet and generating enough force to separate the planet’s clouds pushing through the Atmosphere is over 3 times the GBE of the Moon itself, the force of the meteor colliding with our Atompshere would be akin to the Dwarf Planet Ceres colliding with our Planet Earth. In Graphic terms, merely impacting the Atmosphere and causing a Realistic parting of clouds is more than enough to completely destroy the surface fo the planet and reduce the planet into a fireball in a single day.

All this produced by an Asteroid no bigger than a small mountain which going by my original calcs is around 111,814,512,144,166.9 kg versus Circus which is over 9.4×10^20 kg and is the size of the state of Texas whereas the Asteroid Irene flung at earth was no smaller than a large town.

Yet moving at over 61.6% the speed of Light, it impacts the Planet Earth as if was the mass of Ceres and this is before the Asteroid even lands on the Surface, just a mere 12 km downward. At this point, it just seems like complete overkill, if the hellfires don’t engulf the planet or the sheer secondary shockwave doesn’t kill what wasn’t already destroyed, the sheer force at this point as the Asteroid rapidly goes down would be exerting pressure on the planet of roughly 3.2338793607e+30 PSI. That’s basically the eqauilvent of carrying the mass of the Sun per Square Inch.

Deus Sama Cloud Parting energy: 87.327 Exatons of TNT(Moon Level +)

Now for the final verdict on the Asteroid impact itself.

Let’s recap the feat with the Lake Siclroia scaling feat.

Fairy Tail Guild:40px (25.8 m)

Cillf depth:438px(282.51 m)

Now for redoing the scaling with the mountain.

Fairy Tail Guild: 16px(25.8m)

Zeref’s Mountain: 96px(154.8 m)

Distance between Gildarts and the mountain 669px(1,078.76 m)

Yeah, this calc is very cute, however now that we have a possible timeframe of this feat thanks to the Brandish calc and learned several things since then, let’s revise this and see what we get this time.

Guild:9px(25.8 m)

Meteor Fragment Length and width: 12px(34.4m)

Meteor Fragment Height:29px(83.133 m)

Area length:861px(2,468.19m)

Meteor Fragment:10px(83.133 m)

Meteor diameter:205px(1,704.2265 m)

Velocity:184,837,262.3739922 m/s(61.65%c)

The anime further verifies the sheer size fo the Asteriod as Erza flies into the Asterido and seemingly disappears, implying the Asteriod is more or less 1 mile wide.

www.maps.com/custom-radius-map…

That’s the eqauilvent of stretching form as far north as Times Square to the Flation Building on 23rd street in Manhattan. That’s far larger than the Asteroid’s original projection at merely 30 meters.

A normal Asteriod of this size moving at average Meteor speeds of 11km would be devastating enough, producing 8.983666110854478e+20 Joules of TNT or 214.714 Gigatons of TNT.

Enough to be over 10 times the entire World’s Nuclear Stockpile during the cold war or equal the potentially destructive force of the Yellowstone Super Volcano Eruption that would doom humanity.

This, however, is far from a normal Asteriod. Given it’s Enchanted, it’s density is far superior to Iron, the same iron Irene at a much weaker and younger time could effortlessly slice through with a twig giving the Asteriod the same density as the densest metal in the planet Osmium

, a metal twice as dense as lead at ~22.6 g/cm3 –1 000 000 = 22,590 kg/m^3

Combined with its insane speed of traveling Lunar Obits in seconds, this Asteriod would be hitting at far more destructive force.

Meteor dimensions:1,704.2265 mx^3

The volume of the meteor:4949734933.340722 m^3

Density of Rock:22,590 kg/m^3

Mass:111,814,512,144,166.9 kg

1.910060980460806e+30 joule = 456 515 530 700 000 megaton [explosive] 456.515 Exatons of TNT (Small Planet Level)

1.910060980460806e+30 joule = 1.9477201496e+29 kilogram-force meter.

Irene’s Deus Sama: 456.515 Exatons of TNT (Small Planet Level)

Dragon Irene’s Lifting Strength:1.9477201496e+29 kilogram-force meter( Class N/Pre Stellar)

In other words, this would be the eqauilvent half the force of dropping the moon on Planet Earth with the moon traveling at 11 km/sec, to put in short this would be the eqauilvent of the ending of Majora’s Mask if you failed to stop Majora from dropping the moon in real life.

To put into perspective of how fucked someone is, this would be the end result of the entire earth if Deus Sama moving at 61.6%c impacted with the force eqauilvent of a Moon-sized Asteroid moving at normal meteor speeds. There would simply be no life, nothing, everyone would die instantouesly and the chances of all life would be pretty much gone from the planet, no bunker in the world or underground shelter would even protect you as the earth shakes and breaks and the entire crust of the planet is destroyed.

Everyone in Isghal would be instantaneously pancaked and vaporized within a second, in five seconds the crust is ejected violently up the Atmosphere, those who survived the initial shockwave as the meteor casually shoots through the atmosphere or the massive plasma trail left behind or even the insane pressure generated parting the clouds, the moment the Comet of death hits the planet, you would be instantouesly destroyed.

At this point, the temperatures reach to that of Super Giant Star with your body feeling the pressure of over 3.3810929573e+31 PS1 which would be like every Square of your body being weighed down with Super Giant Stars.

The Impact would instantaneously produce a Magnitude 18.988 on the Richter Scale, in this state, the planet literally shakes as the crust shakes, breaks and sinks into the mantle of the planet so if you survive the thermal radiation, insane windspeeds and crushing pressure, you could be killed by the earthquake.

www.stardestroyer.net/Resource…

The force of the explosion is so powerful that even on the moon, you would get third-degree burns from the blinding thermal radiation caused by the explosion, thermal radiation would stretch out for 11,945,968.8 kilometers, the moon’s surface would be hit by flames over 3,000 degrees with the moon being at the Air Burst radius of 496,935.6 kilometers which is enough to desotry everything on the surface of the moon, the fireball 17781464 seconds or 6 months and 3 weeks before the fireball dissipates with the planets burning for over thousands of years.

The explosion would violently eject debris which would become their own asteroids with debris being over 1km wide, falling at average meteor speeds, they pelt the already damaged earth by the millions while some debris are sent flying as far as 145,120,589.901 km, pelting the nearby planets of Mars and Venus with thousands of debris and fragments in a matter of 83 days after the explosion doing damage to the surface of their planets. with each meteor being able to do at least 143.403 Gigatons of TNT per asteroid fragment impact on Mars and Venus

Once the planet eventually cools off after millions of years and it starts to rain to fill in the barren dry planet, there would be a permeant crater 5,223.781 Kilometers wide and 1,305.945 Kilometers deep which would make it almost impossible to reform our oceans, the Crater would premenatetly expose the Inner Mantle of the Earth creating one giant Volcano on the planet. The Volcano Crater would be hundreds of Kilometers high with the area equal to 27,287,887.935961 Square Kilometers, that’s larger than the entire North American Continent. The Earth would have its own ring system from the impact as quintillions of kg of rock hover over the planet, the planet would never be the same again.

The sheer mass eqauilvent of the impact of Deus Sema is if you placed the mass of 100 Jupiter sized planets on Earth’s Gravity at 9.81 m/s or the typical mass of a Drawf Star.

Meaning going by physics, the Asteriod Impact would equal in energy to trying to lift more than 31,800 Earth’s in mass off the ground on earth’s Gravity of 9.81 m/s, a feat vritually impossible by physics as if the earth had such mass, it would cease to exist.

In other words, assuming scientists could even detect this realistivc Asteriod traveling to our planet, in other to have any chance of stopping this Asteriod is to construct a rocket that would need to go at the exact same speed of a meteor. This would require over 316527547535931.1 Kgs of steel or 316.5 Billion Metric Tons of Steel, that’s more steel than our planet produces annually at 1.6912 Billion Metric Tons meaning it would take over just to build this ship.

This would make the rocketship appormeixtely 3,410.4 meters in Diameter and height. That’s times larger than the Three Gorges Dam in length.

Or the Cifruamance equal to nearly 13 Burj Khalifa’s

With a surface Area equal to 11.6308282 Sq Kilometers, that’s about 1/10th the size of the Bronx sustainable on this rocket ship. If compared to the Borough of the Bronx, you can pretty much fit my whole block inside this spacecraft, the Energy needed to propel this bad boy to space would be far too much for any possible Earth fuel source to achieve so to even come close to powering this.

Humans would need to learn harassed Anti Matter to push it, fortunately, a single gram of Anti Matter produces roughly 1.8×1014 Joules of energy which is more destructive power than the first two atomic bombs dropped. To get the equivalent to pushing this mass at 60% lightspeed. You would need roughly 10,611,449,891,448.92 kg worth of Anti Matter to propel this massive ball of steel to the earth at 1.910060980460806e+30 Joules, which is eqauilvent 90,427,370,467 Barrels filled with Anti Matter, that’s more Anti Matter in the barrels than the world’s annual Oil production at 34,565,500,000 Barrels of Oil, you need around 2 years, 7 months, 1 week and 3 days of oil production to match the numbers of barrels.

Such a mindblowing amount of energy would probably require over 300 years of technological innovations, that would be the only way to stop Deus Sema realistically, assuming the asteriod is coming from 500 Lightyears away.

All of these would be the effects of Deus Sema at it’s purest power, it’s enough to kill any and all life on the planet almost instantousely. It would take over 45,651,553,070,500 Average W-76 Nuclear Warheads to even come close to equalling the power needed to cancel out a destructive Asteroid of this kind.

That’s enough nukes to give every living human being in the world 6,087 W-76 Nukes or basically the equivalent of giving every man and woman on the planet their own Nuclear Stockpile.

, basically an ANCAP’s wetdream.

Or giving every human being on the planet at least 12 Tsar Bombas for every 7.5 Billion Humans alive.

This would be roughly enough energy to 1.061 Billion exawatt hours, this is enough to power the entire world for over 212,200,000 years which is over 3 times the length between the modern era and the Cretaceous Period, which is basically enough to solve all energy problems in the world for millions of years.

And all that is inferior to Erza who was able to destroy this Asteroid…At half her hidden potential! Yes, you’re not reading this wrong, Erza is generating more enegery in her entire body crippled than every human being armed with over 2,000 Tsar Bombas.

So how powerful is Erza? She not only stopped the meteor outright but intercepted it when it was reaching the planet at a distance of over 9 km away, meaning that her speed had to match that of the Asteroid at a bare minimum, as seen with the gifs there, Erza is moving very close to Lightspeed

As we showed in the anime timeframe, The meteor approached Earth in 3 seconds with a 2-second margin of error, if we include attack activation speed which took around 6 seconds, this would give Erza about 9-11 seconds to react to the spell used. This is consistent given the average use of words per minute is 150 and this is excluding anime logic. Erza spoke about 30 words in the timeframe Deus Sema was coming towards earth which is about 12 seconds which is more less close to the time passed to react.

Erza despite crippled was able to intecpert the meteor moving at the same speed as the meteor itself and this is prior to further acccleaerting pass the speed she was in…Meaning if she went even faster than 61.6%c, does that mean she’s achieved the speed of Light?

Going by this, very likely but let’s reaffirm this with hard calcs.

Meteor diameter:164px(1,704.2265 m)

Distance Erza is from Meteor:152px(1,579.527 m)

Distance from Sea Level: 928px(9,643.428 m)

Velocity of the meteor:184,837,262.3739922 m/s(61.65%c)

Distance bullet was away from Surface= 9,643.428 m

184,837,262.3739922 m/sx9,643

Distance the character moved = 13.934+35 m) x (Speed of projectile ) / (Distance the projectile was away from the tank = 35m))

184,837,262.3739922 m/sx9,643 m+1,579.527 m/9,643 m

Erza’s Speed:215,113,674.95 m/s (71.7 % SoL/Realsitstvic+)

So not quite Lightspeed but very close.

First, let’s factor Erza’s speed regarding her takeoff launch speed

Keep in mind she threw herself up into the air with one arm, which is impressive in itself.

Erza’s weight presumably: 54.43 kg

The distance achieved:9,643.428 m

Erza’s Speed:215,113,674.9557411 m/s (71.7 % c)

Erza’s throwing strength:2.518688004315843e+18 Newtons or 601.980 880 57 megatons of TNT(Mountain Level+)

Now for ForcexDistance.

2.518688004315843e+18 Newtonsx9,643.428 m

2.428878642408352e+22 Joules

Now comes the fun part, finding out how much cutting force/destructive power Erza has if she can spit a whole meteor in half and those halves violently fragment and break into so many pieces that they burn up.

Now for the final possible kinetic Energy of Erza colliding with the Asteroid before doing her devastating slash that destroyed it.

Erza’s speed:215,113,674.9557411 m/s (71.7 % c)

Mass:111,814,512,144,166.9 kg

E=MxC^2/2

E=2.587046393955001e+30 Joules

2.587046393955001e+30 joule = 618 318 927 810 000 megaton [explosive] 618.318 Exatons of TNT

Erza’s Kinetic Impact against Deus Sema: 618.318 Exatons of TNT(Smal Planet level+)

Going with Because science video on cutting bullets we can get a good take on perhaps what power is needed to cut something as massive as the Asteroid so instead of bullets, try an almost the speed of light death Asteroid.

P=KE/ D/A

Erza: 591px(175 cm or 68.9 inches)

Sword Length:331px(38.58866328257191 inches)

Sword Width: 18 px(2.1 inches)

Area of sword:

P=KE/ D/A

P=11,814,512,144,166.9 kgx184,837,262.3739922 m/s(61.65%c)

D=1,704.2265 m

A=80.97464468882175 sqaure inches

P=2.924950245761383e+24 Pascals or 424.228 Quntillion Psi

Erza’s Slashing Pressure:424.228 Quintillion Psi

This is over 29.24 times Pressure inside the core of a white dwarf at the Chandrasekhar limit, Erza’s is actually exerting as much pressure from her sword strike as a Neutron star’s Surface pressure. Now that we got the pressure of Erza’s slash.

Erza within the instant of the slash also completely dispersed the immense fireball within the Upper Atmosphere roughly the size of the Continental United States and tanked the kinetic shockwave caused by the dispersing.

As we know fires can be dispersed by explosive shockwaves.

The Swedish Air Force dropped a laser-guided bomb on a forest fire to help suppress the flames. The idea here is to snuff out fires the way you’d blow out birthday candles at the base. In Sweden, the shockwave from a single bomb snuffed out flames within a 100-yard radius of the impact point. Going by 100 meters equalling 1,000,000 m^3 caused by the Mark 82 bombs.

www.endmemo.com/cconvert/m3m.p…

The Mark 82 bombs pack about 89 kg of Tritonal high explosives, which can produce around 421.3 megajoules, going by division, that means that a typical explosive shockwave can generate about 421.3 J/m^3, now imagine the flames.

Volume of Fireball:1.277569121808e+18 m^3

Denisty of Air:1.225 kg/m^3

Mass of the Atmosphere:1.5650221742148e+18 kg

6.593438419966952e+20

659 343 841 996 695 100 000 joule = 157 586.960 32 megaton [explosive]

Erza’s Slashing Secondary Shockwave:157.586 Gigatons of TNT(Large Island Level)

Assuming Low End, Erza would be exterting roughly 2.12 times the force as the Toba Eruption, a Mega Eruption 70,000 years ago that almost wiped out humanity and that’s purely the shockwave alone indirectly caused by the meteor, enough to put out a 4.172 Trillion Gallon Oil Fire or 99.33 Billion Barrels of oil. That’s over 99 times the enegery burned by the Kuwaiti Oil Fires that took over 6 months to put out, with a single instantaneous sword swing.

Now for the thermal power to completely put out flames instantly.

Vaporization of Oxygen:213,125 J/kg

The temperature of Atmospheric Entry:3,825 °C

Average Atmospheric temperatures: -15 C

Mass of the Atmosphere:1.5650221742148e+18 kg

Explosive shockwave:421.3 J/m^3

3,825 °C – -15 C=3840°C

1.5650221742148e+18 kgx213,125 J/kgx3840°C

1.280814147377392e+27 Joulesx421.3 J/m^3

5.396070002900952e+29 Joules

5.396070002900952e+29 joule = 128 969 168 330 000 megaton [explosive]

Erza’s Slashing Primary Shockwave: 128.969 Exatons of TNT(Moon Level+)

So even with the direct shockwave caused by the meteor being destroyed in the air that’s more than 4 times the force needed to destroy the moon via GBE.

Now for the fragments of the meteor scattered across the area

Meteor Fragment Length and width: 12px(34.4m)

Meteor Fragment Height:29px(83.133 m)

Meteor volume:98,376.26688 m^3

Density of Rock:22,590 kg/m^3

Mass:2,222,319,868.8192 kg(1/50,314th the meteor’s mass)

The fragments being flung are much slower than the meteor reaching 9km in under 3 seconds giving the fragments a speed of 3,000 m/s, far slower than average meteors.

Each of the meteor fragments falling down would produce roughly 2.39 Megatons of TNT which is still a devasting city buster.

Deus Sema broken meteor fragments:2.39 Megatons of TNT (Small City level+)

This is more or less equal to the power of One Russian R-12 missle pre fragment and as seen with the damage to mountains, each fragment is fatal.

Considering there are potentially 50,314 meteor fragments of this size if all of them are combined, the combined might of these fragments would be up to 120.251 Gigatons of TNT, that’s nearly 6 times the combined World’s Nuclear Stockpile in 1960 at over 20 Gigatons.

Thankfully most of the meteor fragments seem to have been destroyed by friction alone and the few remaining crashed into mountains.

now for the cutting force of her attack.

The meteor as we know is roughly 1,704.2265 m or roughly 67095.53in, adding Cirfurimfance of the slash, that is 210679.9642 inches across when you factor the slash of roughly 80.97464468882175 inches, the slashing force of Erza should be roughly 4.989887679499683e+31 Joules or 11 926 117 781 000 000 megatons or over 11.926 Zettatons of TNT to generate enough force to completely fragment the Asteroid with it’s intense slashing pressure.

Erza’s Hidden Potential Slash:11.926 Zettatons of TNT(Small Planet level+)

Erza is slashing with roughly 10.42 times the GBE of Mars which would require over 1.144 zettatons of TNT to essentially destroy the planet Mars.

Or over 1.51 times the energy released by the sun daily which is 7.89 zettatons, all of this enegery released by Erza in presumably less than a second.

Now that’s a shit ton of crazy destructive power Erza is unleashing at once. And this is not counting the fact she’s only using one hand……YES, THAT AMOUNT OF POWER WITH ONE HAND!

Powerscaling from Irene alone, Natsu and Zeref should be at the very least Planet Level+ and Lightspeed to FTL speed. Logically if an awakened Erza who reacted to a 60% SoL meteor is Relativistic+ and Zeref and Natsu are at least close to Light speed at 99.999% the speed of Light in their full powered forms bloodlusted, then Zeref via Fairy Heart is easily Faster than Light by sheer powerscaling by 100 times, especially if one can argue that Gildarts and August scaling from Erza are near Light Speed already.

It should be arguable that Neo Eclipse should be far superior to Ultears Last Ages which wrapped Earth’s Rotation energy at Mass Enegery speed and described as having “Infinite Energy”

Anna herself compares the size of Neo Eclipse to that of an Orange, an Orange is roughly 40cm wide.

Going by the description, Neo Eclipse is comparable to a Mirco Black Hole as it’s said not even Light could escape it and Anna was confident it could kill even Ancologia.

www.omnicalculator.com/physics…

Going by Anna’s description, a 40 cm blackhole the size of an Orange has the mass of 45.1 Earths. Going back to Ultear’s feat of Earth’s Mass Energy, muplty that mass Enegery by 45.1 and you would get up to 5.8179 Tenakilotons which is Large Star level+.

Sadly this is debatable whether it can be used at all given Ichyia and Anna survived it.

Though considering Ancologia literally as in the middle of Absorbing the mass, it would be more likely Ichyia survived not merely because Mashima can’t kill any good characters(Although that doesn’t help either) but because Ancologia was already in the middle of absorbing the Blackhole like object hence Ichyia escaped due to luck and bad writing.

It should be noted that Ancologia was only beaten via prep that required at least a whole continent worth of Magic for Lucy to use Fairy Sphere while Acnologia was on a ship( A weakness of Dragon Slayers being motion sick).

And Natsu combining all the Dragon Slayers Flames into one in order to beat Ancologia post Ravines of Time so it’s Nigh Impossible to scale EoS Natsu or any character aside from Fairy Heart Zeref to Ancologia Post Ravines of time until further notice so Natsu’s power would cap at best Star level+ via Seven Flames Mode given Savage Dragon Force+END mode Natsu killed Fairy Heart Zeref and Seven Flames Natsu>Savage Dragon Force+END.

And for those who want to claim this feat is riddciolus, I didn’t write the series, Mashima did, I’m merely showcasing what’s written here. It would utterly absurd to claim Ultear’s feat doesn’t count when it actually affected the plot, And even more ridiculous to claim characters who literally have “Infinite Energy” who can ltierally bend space and time don’t casually produce the mass-energy of earth when much weaker characters could do that.

That’s like claiming because Pell survived a Nuke( Which is one of the biggest Outliers in One Peice,) means that the Nuke wouldn’t have destroyed the capital city of Alabasta

I ran out of space to put the final tally at so expect that in another journal, but first time to go to the rival series of Fairy Tail(Power level wise, definitely not writing wise) One Piece.

well I think we’re at a good point to talk about FGO so far at this point as we are now in the final stretch and all hell has broken loose this week. let’s go over everything that’s happened from episode 10 to 15.

First we got the inroduction of one of the best big sis waifus in FGO, Quetzalcoatl. She pretty much charges into Uruk and takes on a hundred men with her herculean strength and performs lucha libre style on them. yeah she loves how there’s luchadores in the present era and loves the showmanship. she can be pretty adorable when you make her feel flustered. she leaves Uruk cause she already defeated a hundred foes and would return the following day for another hundred. this puts gilgamesh in a spot to order ritsuka and the others to defeat her and retrieve the axe of marduk as well. the axe that was once used to slit tiamat’s throat. we also see “Ishtar” having more chats with Ritsuka but her sneezes give away it’s not actually Ishtar talking to Ritsuka giving us more cute moments and of course Ritsuka uses his Harem EX skill to charm and get Jaguar Man(yes Jaguar Man not Warrior) to join the party as another contracted servant much to Ana’s dismay and Mash making sure Jaguar understands she’s the “official” servant lol Am I sensing Mash yandere there? lol

the following episode gives us another amazing battle as Quetz takes on everyone and pretty much one dominates them due to the fact one of her divine trait abilities being that she is a goddess of absolute good and no one who has any amount of good traits can harm her. So, had Ritsuka brought a servant with an evil trait then they may have had a change but even then Quetz is too fast and has too much power on her especially since her sun stone from the aztecs is on the field that further boosts her power. Ritsuka eventually beats her by showing her humanity’s will by diving from the sky after Ishtar gives him a lift to do a body slam on her. now falling from that height would’ve killed him but Quetz caught him after he passed out cause as he reveals Quetz loves humanity which made her fall for the guy and declare she loses and will be his newest servant. I loved how she gets all scary face on jaguar man lol man Quetz is too awesome and cute and I gotta give her VA props in how she manages to pull off japanese and spanish and FYI I think funimation had to pay extra money for the english dub VA they hired for Quetz. this episode ended with Gilgamesh being declared dead and Gil waking up in Kur aka Babylonia underworld.

So everyone in the next episode talk about how Gil died and how Merlin could still be there and then Quetz reveals Ishtar was never in the 3 goddess alliance but it was actually her sister Ereshkigal. After realizing Ereshkigal was involved it was decided Ishtar would take Ritskua and Mash to Kur to convince Ereshkigal to let go of Gil. Once they got there and realize Babylonia much like Greece was once a place where the gods and humans existed in the same plane of existence where things like the underworld could be accessed pretty easily. Ereshkigal has 7 gates where she asks a question and in turn you give up something… at least normally where Ishtar notices Ereshkigal called out Ritsuka by name and asked her who between Ishtar and Ereshkigal is the most beautiful. in the game you get these questions which would determine the difficulty of the fight but the anime only did one gate and skipped the other 6 but still funny in how Ishtar proclaims how she’s so beautiful she will always be picked till ereshkigal brought down her godly wrath on her sister lol so with each gate Ishtar lost more of her divinity till she shrank down to the size of tinker bell and rides on Fou who looks annoyed she’s on his back lol this also leads to them finding Gil who’s a soul at the moment and can’t help but laugh at Ishtar’s situation in how she shrank so much. once at the bottom they find Ereshkigal in monster form.

So, the battle with Ereshkigal was done very well and it added that bit of emotional depth in show and explaining why Ereshkigal is doing all of this. This also gave Mash another shot to show off her noble phantasm as she becomes the unbreakable shield that is powered by her will that can even withstand a god’s wrath. once Ereshkigal saw she lost we get a lot of adorable moments of her and see Ishtar and Ereshkigal taunt each other lol it’s literally Rin taunting Rin lol But basically you get to see why a lot of people put Ereshkigal as their top waifu. We also see the return of the mysterious old man as he cut Ereshkigal in half but what he cut was her alliance to the 3 goddesses’ alliance since they have a pact where they can’t attack each other making her free to do what she wants. Ereshkigal makes the promise she’ll appear when they need the help and we also see how Ishtar is too tsundere to admit she’s always worried about her baby sister as everything gets resolved in kur and Gil as his soul returns to his body discovers Enkidu’s body is missing which revealed Kingu is using Enkidu’s actual body which is why he can’t kill Gilgamesh.

in the following episode we get a lot of focus on Ana this time as she lets her hood down and she shows how she’s gotten attached to an old lady who runs a flower shop and Ana’s true identity is technically revealed but that’s mostly something fate fans realize easily enough from her appearance alone. We also get a pretty epic fight between Quetz and Kingu and one of 2 very impressive physical feats Quetz performs as she throws the axe at the temple where Gorgon hid herself to cut her divinity. Mash sees how the humans captured by gorgon were being mutated into monsters only for Ritsuka to tell her to ignore them and Merlin explains how there’s nothing they can do for them as they’re too far gone to be saved and need to focus on gorgon. once there Gorgon appears in all her massive glory and whether cause she wants Ritsuka for personal reasons or something else she basically tries to convince him to forget saving humanity cause he should know how pointless humans are given our whole history and join her and be her master. naturally he says no then Ana shows her face to Gorgon revealing that she is obviously Medusa as a child and Gorgon due to her hatred is unable to see her child self, as all Gorgon can see is dark shadows covering Ana and thinks she sees an ugly monster. Ana also releases her full divinity powers as Medusa that she kept sealed for this moment for her mystic eyes to counter Gorgon’s.

and now we are at our most current episode. we start by looking at Ana and Gorgon’s or rather Medusa’s memories of the island she lived on with her sisters and reveals what she truly wanted more than anything as well as showing the guilt she has after becoming a monster and ate her sisters of which Stheno and Euryale accepted their fate to be with their baby sister. then we get to the fight with Gorgon as Ana handles most of the fight on her own with Ishtar, Merlin, and Mash providing support. Why just Ana? well aside from her mystic eyes, Ana has the scythe that can kill immortals whether human or god. Ana lands the killing blow as both Gorgon and Ana fall into the hole in the ground and both spirit origins apparently disappeared. Kingu appears where after a brief fight he reveals everything went according to plan as Gorgon obviously was put as a fake Tiamat who had the actual authority of Tiamat linked to her and that linked Tiamat to Gorgon to experience death and caused the real Tiamat to wake up from her sealed slumber. she still hasn’t fully awakened but the beast class disaster tiamat releases her children of new humans Kingu bragged about on the world as things get dark fast. these creatures known as Lahmu attack and speak in chuthullu sounding language but a twitter user points out that it’s still japanese but mostly spoken backwards. anyway the Lahmu are fucked up little shits as they have no reason to kill, hunt or even eat humans and are just attacking for literal shits and giggles to the point they make the people they capture attack and kill each other for their amusement and promise to let the winner leave only to kill them anyway. the children would’ve been next but Ritsuka’s group fight them. They also find Siduri is missing and upon fighting the Lahmu, the one Quetz drop kicks shows she’s Siduri by doing the white flag hand gesture that Ishtar did. they let her go as Siduri Lahmu walks away. Kingu comes in showing he’s not too happy with his new siblings wasting time and thinking he was safe only to be betrayed and stabbed by the lahmu as they say they found their brother to be very boring and laugh.

Man…. that was a lot to go over but man a few minor things here and there one could nitpick but overall FGO Babylonia continues to be consistently good with great animation, voice acting, music, and well executed sound effects. even the Lahmu sound creepy as all sin and while the killings the lahmu did isn’t as fucked up as say Blood C, it is something dark for this story. with 6 episodes left to air I’m actually excited to see how they will play things out and hopefully things remain consistently good or better and all I gotta say is Cloverworks definitely stepped up where A1 and shaft messed up on fate apocrypha and last encore. what do you all think of FGO so far right? leave your thoughts in the comments below as we enter the final stretch of babylonia.
